title: BRIEF-Mastercard Inc Says CEO Ajay Banga's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.7 Million Versus $16.9 Million In 2016
text:
April 27, 2018 / 6:54 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago BRIEF-Mastercard Inc Says CEO Ajay Banga's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.7 Million Versus $16.9 Million In 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - Mastercard Inc:
* MASTERCARD INC SAYS CEO AJAY BANGA’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $18.7 MILLION VERSUS $16.9 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING
* MASTERCARD INC - SAYS CFO MARTINA HUND-MEJEAN'S TOTAL 2017 COMPENSATION WAS $6.6 MILLION VERSUS $5.8 MILLION IN 2016 Source text - ( bit.ly/2HYdslW ) Further company coverage:
